name: Father: The Truth
description:
You just woke up on a dark rainy evening, your parents have gone out for dinner and you're home alone.

But is that the truth? What has happened in this house while you were asleep? What are the secrets that lay hidden within this house?

Find out in this short, retro horror game inspired by video games from 90's combined with semi realistic lighting, a dark moody atmosphere and plenty of tension evoking moments!

CONTROLS

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Interact
  • + (Plus) - Increase Sensitivity
  • - (Minus) - Decrease Sensitivity
